Team.title: Our team
Team.dmitryImpact: During the development of the application, I set up the backend, implemented the localization configuration, and implemented the main page view of the application.
Team.aldarImpact: Managed the process of creating the application. Built the project structure, add basic styles and components. Responsible for the Welcome page and the Board page
Team.annaImpact: When developing the application, I created routes and an implementation of error handling. Implemented authorization and work with the profile. Created the basic of the Redux logic, including RTK Query.

Course.title: Course
Course.text: This app was designed and implemented as part of the React framework course by Rolling Scopes School

WelcomePage.title: Orgapp simplifies teamwork!
WelcomePage.text: We have created a convenient application for planning your projects. Track the progress of tasks, complete them on time, distribute the work among your team members correctly!
